title: Marinated Vegetable Salad
ingredients: 16 oz frozen or fresh shelled green peas, cooked 3 mins & drained
16 oz cut green beans, frozen or fresh, cooked 8 mins & drained
1 red bell pepper, cored, seeded, chopped
instructions: Bring the vinegar and sugar to a boil in medium saucepan.
Add the oil and salt and set aside to cool.
Add the peas, beans, onions, pimentos, bell pepper, and celery.
Transfer the mixture to a bowl, cover with plastic wrap, and marinate in the refrigerator for 24 hrs.
